title: Tech Mentors
description: The website provides access for users to enroll in various educational programs(Ex: Web Development, Software Development).

title: Movie Site
description: This site lets users search for and find movies they need, providing a convenient way to access desired films or information about them.

title: Read Lanka
description: An online book reading and listening website, Allows users to access books digitally

title: Designer Site
description: This website enables users to create logos, flyers, business cards, T-shirts, and web designs, offering various tools for graphic and digital design projects.

title: S & D Chemicals
description: Displays details about staff members, company machines, and products, giving users access to comprehensive information about the organization's equipment.

title: Landing Site
description: This site provides users with information on all sales and service facilities related to the construction industry, offering insights into available resources and services.

title: E Commerce Website
description: This website allows users to purchase clothing, including men's and women's apparel, offering a variety of fashion options.

title: Online Watch Site
description: This website allows users to purchase watches, including men's and women's styles, offering a selection tailored to different preferences.

title: SL Flicks OTT Platform
description: This platform allows users to find and watch movies, TV dramas, and other videos, providing a wide range of entertainment options.

title: Floor Management System
description: This project is a dynamic floor management system using React,Redux, and Draggable components. Users can add, drag, update, and delete tables within rooms, with positions and details managed via Redux state and stored locally for persistence. The system supports real-time updates and modal-based table customization
